name: not alone (squareSquared)
description:
You are not alone.  Do not make noise. Find a way out.  

Not mobile compatible 

Use headphones (directional audio)

Sound warning may be loud

movement - WASD 

run - Lshift + WASD

interact/hide - e

Credits:

code: Nicholas Schnorbus

art: Ulizes Alexqueno, Mansib Anan, Shirish Patel

sounds/music: Nicholas Schnorbus, Jeremy Schnorbus, Shirish Patel, Neoma Emery

coach: Jeremy Schnorbus, 

helpful: Gabrielle Schnorbus
